Vinyl Reviews - Marshall Crenshaw - Field Day Expanded Edition
s: Kevin Gray’s remaster of the album for Intervention Records retains the excitement and drive of the original while giving instruments more space to make their mark. He also remains true to Lillywhite’s detail-dense production even has he delivers a bigger soundstage.
